info.name: Tree Style Tab: compact tabs
info.description: Compact vertical tabs added using Tree Style Tab extension
info.additionalInfo: 2013-10-09: Added small margin between tab text and collapsed tabs counter 2012-10-04: Compact close buttons and "twisties" 2012-09-01: Improved compatibility with Informational Tab thumbnails 2012-09-01: Improved style of horizontal tab bar (detailed changes)
